dcterms:creator: T. Salzmann
B. Ivanovic
P. Chakravarty
M. Pavone
dcterms:description: The ETH dataset is a collection of video segments of pedestrian trajectories, which has been processed to store the states of each agent per frame id and divided into train, test, and validation sets for uniform accuracy comparison.
dcterms:title: ETH Dataset

dcterms:creator: T. Salzmann
B. Ivanovic
P. Chakravarty
M. Pavone
dcterms:description: The UCY dataset consists of video segments of pedestrian trajectories, similar to the ETH dataset, and has been processed to maintain uniformity in accuracy comparison across different models.
dcterms:title: UCY Dataset

dcterms:description: The Simulated Situations Dataset is based on the OpenAI gym and consists of 5000 simulated situations where the positions of 5 random agents are stored for each time step.
dcterms:title: Simulated Situations Dataset

dcterms:creator: N. Deo
E. Wolff
O. Beijbom
dcterms:description: The nuScenes dataset is a multimodal dataset for trajectory prediction that is conditioned on lane-graph traversals, providing a rich set of data for training models in autonomous driving contexts.
dcterms:title: nuScenes Dataset
